scripts.watch: parallelshell "npm run watch:css -s" "npm run watch:html -s" "npm run watch:js -s"
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:html && npm run build:js
scripts.build:js: browserify bin/www > dist/index.js && browserify -t browserify-compile-templates --extension=.html public/js/main.js > public/js/bundle.js
scripts.deploy:setup: npm run build && mkdir dist/public && mkdir dist/public/js && mkdir dist/public/stylesheets && mkdir dist/public/resources
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:setup && cp public/js/bundle.js dist/public/js && cp public/index.html dist/public && cp public/stylesheets/style.css dist/public/stylesheets && cp public/resources/* dist/public/resources/
